prompt_template.author: metaGOTHIC
prompt_template.description: Example template showing the XML schema structure for SDLC prompts

variable.name: project_name
variable.description: Name of the project being analyzed

variable.name: phase
variable.description: SDLC phase (requirements, design, implementation, testing, deployment)

task_definition.objective: Analyze the {{project_name}} project in the {{phase}} phase and provide structured guidance

requirements.requirement: Understand the current project state and requirements
Identify potential risks and mitigation strategies
Provide actionable recommendations for the {{phase}} phase

thinking_level.surface: Understand the immediate requirements and current state
thinking_level.analysis: Examine the relationships between components, identify patterns, and assess risks
thinking_level.strategic: Consider long-term implications, scalability, and alignment with business objectives
thinking_level.architectural: Evaluate system design decisions, technology choices, and architectural patterns
